name: First Contact (darqwerful)
description:
You're on your way to your home galaxy when suddenly your ship is hit by an asteroid. Luckily, there's an inhabited planet nearby where you can get the materials required to repair your ship. Unluckily, its inhabitants are kind of strange and don't really seem interested in helping you. 

Controls: Mouse (Right click to use items in inventory and to put them back. Left click for everything else.)

The game saves your progress automatically.
